item.title: 市场避险情绪升温，石油跌势扩大
item.description: 在股市和其他风险资产大跌的影响下，石油连续第二天下跌。【原文：Oil fell a second day, tracking a plunge across wider equity markets and other risk assets.】

item.title: 库什塔德公司将继续推进七项专利申请；i 协议有望获得美国批准
item.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.将继续 "友好而坚持不懈地 "尝试达成收购 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. will keep up “friendly and persistent” attempts to forge a deal to acquire Seven & i Holdings Co., saying that it has the financing in place and sees a clear path to gaining antitrust regulatory appeal in the US.】

item.title: TXNM 在获得收购意向后探讨出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TXNM 能源公司在收到一家潜在收购方的收购意向后，正在探讨出售事宜。【原文：TXNM Energy Inc. is exploring a sale after receiving takeover interest from a potential suitor, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 信贷交易员被华尔街的白刃战惊醒
item.description: 席卷股票和其他风险资产的恐慌情绪正慢慢渗入企业信贷市场，引发了新的担忧，即过去两年反弹的债务可能会出现修正。【原文：The fear sweeping through stocks and other risk assets is slowly bleeding across corporate credit markets, raising new worries that debt that has rallied for the last two years could be due for a correction.】

item.title: 聚能公司首席执行官因董事会关系紧张而辞职
item.description: 保利诺有限公司（PolyNovo Ltd.据媒体报道，董事会与高级管理层之间的关系紧张，引发了动荡，公司首席执行官斯瓦米-拉奥特（Swami Raote）辞职，辞职立即生效。【原文：PolyNovo Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Swami Raote resigned, effective immediately, after turmoil sparked by media reports of tension between the board and senior management.】

item.title: 监管机构发出警告后，日本经纪商重新考虑重新包装的日本国债
item.description: 在日本金融监管机构宣布对价值 670 亿美元的所谓结构性贷款市场进行全面取缔后，日本最大的经纪商开始重新考虑向地区性贷款机构出售结构性贷款。【原文：Japan’s biggest brokers are having second thoughts about selling so-called structured loans to regional lenders after the nation’s financial regulator declared a sweeping clampdown on the $67 billion market.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省大力拓展石油直销业务
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省政府正在推进允许油砂生产商以沥青支付特许权使用费的计划，让他们转手出售这些油砂桶，从而大大扩大政府在市场中的作用。【原文：Alberta’s government is moving ahead with plans to allow oil sands producers to pay their royalties in bitumen, letting it turn around and sell those barrels in a major expansion of the government’s role in the market.】

item.title: 贡渥集团着眼于提升美国天然气生产资产
item.description: 贡渥集团主席托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）表示，贡渥集团正在寻求购买更多资产，在最近几年经济繁荣所带来的丰厚收益的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Gunvor Group Chairman Torbjörn Törnqvist said the trading house is looking to buy more assets, building on a flurry of deals it has made by deploying bumper earnings from recent boom years.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌后，亚洲股市有望下滑：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市有望追随美国股市的跌势，纳斯达克100指数（Nasdaq 100）在这一天创下了自2022年以来的最差表现，因为人们越来越担心关税和政府裁员将破坏世界最大经济体的增长。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to track US losses that dragged the Nasdaq 100 to its worst day since 2022, as anxiety mounts that tariffs and government firings will torpedo growth in the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 能源组织敦促七国集团减少对俄罗斯天然气的依赖
item.description: 能源行业团体呼吁七国集团政府摆脱俄罗斯天然气，考虑液化天然气在全球能源安全中的作用。【原文：Energy industry groups are calling on the G7 governments to diversify away from Russian gas and consider the role of liquefied natural gas as global energy security.】

item.title: 股市暴跌，市场投机边缘遭到抨击
item.description: 美国股市出现的避险情绪让去年的大赢家科技巨头们感到痛苦，但与投机性更强的边缘市场相比，这种情绪就显得微不足道了。【原文：The flight from risk taking place in US equities has been painful for the tech giants who were last year’s big winners, but it pales in comparison to the walloping being doled out in the more speculative fringes of the market.】

item.title: 特朗普政府准备对伊朗石油实施制裁
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，特朗普政府准备对伊朗的石油生产实施制裁。【原文：US Energy Secretary Chris Wright said the Trump administration is prepared to enforce US sanctions on Iranian oil production.】

item.title: 人工智能 "独角兽 "追随大科技公司进军印度，数百人受聘的动机
item.description: 车队管理初创公司Motive Technologies Inc.计划将其在印度的员工人数增加一倍以上，加入硅谷越来越多的人工智能独角兽企业在南亚国家扩张的行列。【原文：Fleet management startup Motive Technologies Inc. plans to more than double its India headcount, joining a rising number of artificial intelligence unicorns from Silicon Valley expanding in the South Asian country.】

item.title: YouTube 最红的明星 MrBeast 从巧克力上赚的钱比视频还多
item.description:
野兽工业公司正在寻求融资数亿美元，以拓展新的领域，包括视频游戏、饮料和保健

。【原文：

Beast Industries is looking to raise a couple hundred million dollars to expand into new areas, including video games, beverages and wellness

】

item.title: Hinge Health 申请 IPO，披露收入增长情况
item.description: 数字物理治疗提供商 Hinge Health 公司提交了首次公开募股申请，披露了收入增加和亏损减少的情况。【原文：Hinge Health Inc., a provider of digital physical therapy, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing increasing revenue and shrinking losses.】

item.title: 收购公司包围意大利软件开发商 Namirial
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，几家私募股权公司已表示有兴趣收购意大利软件开发商 Namirial SpA 公司，该公司的交易价值约为 9 亿欧元（9.76 亿美元）。【原文：Several private equity firms have expressed interest in acquiring Italian software developer Namirial SpA, which could be valued at about €900 million ($976 million) in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷先锋受侮辱和犹豫不决拖累
item.description:
Prospect资本公司的现任和前任员工描述了一种功能失调到其他公司不愿与之合作的企业文化； Prospect公司的高管表示，他们拥有良好的投资记录和支持性的工作环境

。【原文：

Current and ex-employees of Prospect Capital describe a culture so dysfunctional that other firms don’t want to work with it; Prospect executives say they have a proven investing track record and supportive work environment

】

item.title: 中国汽车巨头大力发展人工智能、飞行汽车和新牌照
item.description: 上周，中国的政治精英们齐聚北京参加一年一度的全国人民代表大会，汽车企业高管们提出了一系列雄心勃勃的政策建议，旨在推动汽车行业进入下一个智能交通时代。【原文：As China’s political elite gathered for the annual National People’s Congress in Beijing last week, auto executives offered a range of ambitious policy proposals aimed at propelling the industry into the next era of smart mobility.】

item.title: 前高管称日本央行下一次加息可能在 6 月
item.description: 一位前日本央行官员表示，日本央行可能会等到今年年中才会再次加息，因为它希望保持每六个月加息一次的步伐，尽管最近市场猜测日本央行会提前加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan will probably wait until the middle of the year before raising interest rates again as it looks to maintain a pace of one hike every six months despite recent market speculation of an earlier move, a former BOJ official said.】

item.title: 加密货币日间交易者的忠实拥趸发现特朗普治下的生活并非天堂
item.description: 几个月来，热爱加密货币的投资者将数十亿资金投入杠杆策略，希望唐纳德-特朗普能取消对其新兴行业的监管，开创一个数字繁荣的新世界。【原文：For months, crypto-loving investors sank billions into leveraged strategies with the hope that Donald Trump would eliminate regulations on their upstart industry and usher in a new world of digital prosperity.】

item.title: Rite Aid 正在与债权人谈判，以增强其流动性
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Rite Aid 公司正在与资产抵押贷款的提供商进行谈判，以充分获得贷款并实施其扭亏为盈计划。【原文：Rite Aid Corp. is in talks with providers of its asset-backed-loan to fully access the facility and implement its turnaround plan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 甲骨文展望云计算前景强劲，助推星际之门乐观发展
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）报告了预订量激增的情况，并对 6 月开始的财年做出了高于预期的收入预测，这增强了人们对其云基础设施业务正在获得大客户的信心。【原文：Oracle Corp. reported a surge in bookings and gave a revenue forecast for the fiscal year beginning in June that topped estimates, fueling confidence that it is gaining large customers for its cloud infrastructure business.】

item.title: 特朗普引发的市场震荡显示整个华尔街的经济恐慌
item.description: 随着投资者从几乎所有类型的风险中撤退，周一美国股市稳步回落的步伐急剧加快。【原文：What had been a steady pullback from the US stock market accelerated sharply Monday as investors retreated from virtually every type of risk.】

item.title: 云计算提供商 CoreWeave 与 OpenAI 签订价值 119 亿美元的合同
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，CoreWeave 公司已与 OpenAI 公司达成一份为期五年的合同。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. has agreed a five-year contract with OpenAI Inc., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关税焦虑导致 VIX 指数自八月震荡以来首次逼近 30
item.description: 周一，S&P 500 指数的下滑使 Cboe 波动率指数距离 30 点仅有一线之差，而这是该指数上次在 8 月份波动率震荡期间达到的水平。【原文：A slump in the S&P 500 Index on Monday sent the Cboe Volatility Index a hair away from 30, the level it last reached during the volatility shock in August.】

item.title: KKR 任命全球大西洋公司新领导人，Allan Levine 继任
item.description: KKR & Co.正在为其 Global Atlantic 保险部门物色新的领导人，并将其首席执行官兼联合创始人 Allan Levine 调任执行董事长。【原文：KKR & Co. is tapping new leaders for its Global Atlantic insurance unit and moving Allan Levine, its CEO and co-founder, into the role of executive chairman.】

item.title: Venture Global 失败，上市后 380 亿美元迅速化为乌有
item.description: 在进入公开市场时一败涂地的公司名单上又多了一位新的王者：Venture Global Inc.【原文：The list of companies that have flopped out of the gate when entering public markets has a new king: Venture Global Inc.】

item.title: 美国称若波兰对大型科技企业征税将采取报复行动
item.description: 美国驻华沙特使周一警告说，如果波兰对大型科技公司征税，波兰将面临后果。【原文：Poland will face consequences if it introduces a levy on large technology companies, the incoming US envoy to Warsaw warned on Monday, as the spat between the two allies escalated.】

item.title: 加拿大原油暴涨预示关税担忧正在减弱
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对美国进口加拿大石油征收关税的担忧正在减弱，因为征税开始日期不断推迟，使得当地原油价格走强。【原文：Concern about US President Donald Trump’s threats to impose tariffs on US imports of Canadian oil is waning as the duties’ start date keeps getting pushed back, strengthening local crude prices.】

item.title: 美国顶级公用事业公司称天然气仅能满足部分电力需求
item.description: 美国最大的公用事业公司、风能和太阳能发电的头号开发商 NextEra Energy 公司认为，以天然气为燃料的发电厂只能满足预计到本十年末前所未有的电力需求增长的一小部分。【原文：NextEra Energy Inc., the biggest US utility and No. 1 developer of wind and solar generation, believes power plants fueled by natural gas can meet only a sliver of the unprecedented electricity demand growth forecast through the end of the decade.】
